sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.PADActivityRepository</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Process Automation Designer Activity Repository </description>
        <name>PADActivityRepository</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PADActivityRepository = Class.create();
PADActivityRepository.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
	deleteRecord: function(sysId) {
		var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(PADConstants.TABLES.PD_ACTIVITY);
		gr.get(sysId);
		gr.deleteRecord();
		return sysId;
	},
    type: 'PADActivityRepository'
};
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-04-28 20:32:10</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0fef3e0f770b0110b123f825bc5a9980</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>PADActivityRepository</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Process Automation Designer Core - Model" source="com.glide.pad.core.model">0ae817db47220210cd4e1ce4316d431f</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0fef3e0f770b0110b123f825bc5a9980</sys_update_name>
